content.description: This problem deals with functions defined by f(x) = x + b sin x , where b is a positive constant and −2π ≤ x ≤ 2π .
content.question: Are the points of tangency described in part (b) relative maximum points of f? Why?

frqParts.text: Are the points of tangency described in part (b) relative maximum points of f? Why?

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
